overview: This flick is choc-full-o teens. Actually every girl is a teen and they're all waiting to be trained in the art of hard core sex. All six honeys are barely past 18 and they're about to learn quickly what it means to get good. California blonde bombshell Sami has perfect natural tits and an ass from hell. Watch her break out of her innocence. Tyra and Felix will make you wish you were a teenager again. Finally Tennessee sensation Nicole Brazzle shines the brightest as she takes it like a pro!
title: 18 & In Training
